attribute.name: action
attribute.description: A method binding EL expression that identifies an action method to be invoked if this component is activated by the user. An action method accepts no parameters and has a String return value, called the action outcome, that identifies the next view displayed. The phase that this event is fired in can be controlled via the immediate attribute.

attribute.name: actionListener
attribute.description: A method binding EL expression that identifies an action listener method to be invoked if this component is activated by the user. An action listener method accepts a parameter of type javax.faces.event.ActionEvent and returns void. The phase that this event is fired in can be controlled via the immediate attribute.

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: The initial value of this component.
